title: Online Investment Platform
text: Elements provides a platform to securly fund new renewable energy systems.

section.title: 100% Transparent and Secure
section.content: All transactions are public avaialbla and unmutatable story in a eco friendly Blockchain. And all code is Open source and will be audited.

section.title: Free and Permissionless
section.content: Everyone can participate on projects and have a positive impact on the climate change.
